question: If lying on the side while holding an enema, which side is better to lie on?  I think left makes more sense.?
question_content: But I know there are those who teach lying on the right side.  I think lying on the right side is actually bad.  Anyone with good knowledge about this stuff, please answer with explanation.  Thanks!

answers.answer_content: lying on them left, since your rectum descends on that side and then exits via your anus. Once you put the fluid in it will stay for sometime to work, otherwise it may leak out and soil your butt.
